div.div: The mission of the Ouray School District R-1, an educational community built on high expectations, is for all students to contribute responsibly in a global society by ensuring them an exceptional education in a safe and supportive environment.

p.span: Safe 2 Tell provides YOUNG people a way to report any threatening behaviors or activities endangering themselves or someone they know, in a way that keeps them safe and anonymous.

div.div: P.O Box N/400 7th Ave. Ouray, Colorado 81427
